---
title: "Descriptive Statistics"
author: "Santi Novani & Muhammad Apriandito"
---

```{r}
# Load library
library(easystats)
library(pastecs)
```

```{r}
# Load data
data("marketing", package = "datarium")
head(marketing)
```

```{r}
report(marketing)
```

```{r}
stat.desc(marketing)
```


```{r}
# Check Correlation
correlation(marketing)
```


```{r}
summary(marketing)
```
